string.value: |I have to drive through this base to achieve my goal. That looks dangerous.
|I almost have done it... almost...
|I feel as if I know this truck. This symbol, I've seen it somewhere before...
|That's Ivan Go's car, my dad's car! I'll have to take a closer look.
|His body is not inside, so he went further on foot.
|He's very close - but why am I afraid of what lies ahead?
|Oh gods! What is this cursed place?
|Who are all these people?
|Now I get it...
|What draws these people here? What if I can still save them?
|Damn, there are so many bandits here! And more and more!
ASSISTANT|It is a very dangerous place. Follow us, we will lead you out of here.
|Who are you? Anyway, I cannot defeat them all alone. Show me the way!
|I won’t go anyway! They are murderers! You’d better help me defeat them!
|ASSISTANT|You cannot win, neither alone nor with our help. Follow us if you want to live.
|You are right... But I’ll be back!
|I feel the power beckoning me to the Overlord.
|Faster! How slowly this vehicle moves! Argh, hell with it!
|I can't stop, but it's getting harder and harder for me to walk...
|Goddamn it... I... can... n-o-t... m...o...v...e... Argh...
ASSISTANT|Let us show you the way around the military base.
|I do need the detour! I am ready to fight with them. Together we will win!
ASSISTANT|Calm down. You have a mission of utmost importance. Do not waste any time on these madmen.
|All right, lead the way.
Do you wish to travel to another region?
You approached too close to the Source and was engulfed by its power.
